price: Ẹ má ṣe dín n̄ǹkan àwọn ènìyàn kù. Kí ẹ sì má ṣèbàjẹ́ sórí ilẹ̀.
arabic: وَلَا تَبۡخَسُواْ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشۡيَآءَهُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walā tabkhasū al-nāsa ashyāahum walā taʿthaw fī al-arḍi muf'sidīna
